entry.title: How Ardently I Love You
entry.summary:
Author: aweeja

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,780Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 0

Summary: The bird and the cat hide underneath the ink of the sky, in a perpetual game of chase.But when the bird's wings are clipped, will the cat still hunt him down?---I met Jason at 8.I fell in love at 12.He died at 15.And he came back at 18.He came back?
